{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=GT701WG |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/31/2003 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=LNQGT701 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETD7300 |cpu1_cspeed=160 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT49BV322A-70TI |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16800-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1130 |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0F:B3,00:15:05 |oui_eth=00:0F:B3,00:15:05 |default_ch= }} ''54Mbps Wireless DSL Gateway''
[http://www.actiontec.com/support/product_details.php?pid=71 Support page]
[http://qwest.centurylink.com/internethelp/modem-gt701wg.html Used by Qwest] [http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:actiontec:gt701_wg On the OpenWrt wiki]
[http://www.seattlewireless.net/ActiontecGT701 On SeattleWireless] "Actiontec" and "05292A" are silkscreened on the board. ==Images== File:Gt701wg inside full.jpg|board top1 File:Gt701wg inside full straight on.jpg|board top2 File:Gt701wg inside small.jpg|board top3 File:Gt701wg bottom full.jpg|board bottom File:Gt701wg qwest outside small.jpg|external [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::internal| ]]
